body_html:
It's definitely nicer to have non-diverging code paths, but it's not the most important thing. (Correctness, functionality, and performance are more important.)

If you think the refactor isn't too much work, go for it. But it doesn't sound like it's essential for this PR.

If you do have diverging code paths, just make sure that the test cases cover both code paths.

If you do have diverging code paths, just make sure that the test cases cover both code paths.
body:
It's definitely nicer to have non-diverging code paths, but it's not the most important thing. (Correctness, functionality, and performance are more important.)

If you think the refactor isn't too much work, go for it. But it doesn't sound like it's essential for this PR.

If you do have diverging code paths, just make sure that the test cases cover both code paths.
